document.full_text: nearly half of americans want their congressional representatives to oppose a rise in the u.s. debt ceiling, a poll said on friday, as president barack obama and republicans try to bridge differences over how to cut massive annual deficits.
document.title: poll says 47 percent of americans oppose debt increase
lines_and_colors: nearly half of americans want their congressional representatives to oppose a rise in the u.s. debt ceiling, a poll said on friday, as president barack obama and republicans try to bridge differences over how to cut massive annual deficits.
